headline: Schlumberger: ChampionX Integration And Strong Cash Flows Support Buy Case
summary: Schlumberger (SLB) is rated a Buy with 15% upside. Read more on growth drivers, resilient performance, and investment benefits.

headline: SLB Announces Third-Quarter 2025 Results Conference Call
summary: HOUSTON, September 24, 2025--SLB (NYSE: SLB) will hold a conference call on October 17, 2025, to discuss the results for the third quarter ending September 30, 2025.

headline: SLB to Acquire Reservoir Surveillance Leader RESMAN Energy Technology
summary: SLB has signed a deal to acquire RESMAN Energy Technology, a global provider of wireless reservoir surveillance solutions.

headline: Is Schlumberger (SLB) a Good Dividend Stock to Buy Now?
summary: Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) is included among the 15 Best Natural Gas and Oil Dividend Stock to Buy Now. Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) completed the acquisition of ChampionX Corporation in July, bringing in the latter’s $850 million in revenue and $190 million in adjusted EBITDA. The deal is expected to deliver $400 million in annual pre-tax synergies […]

headline: Schlumberger Beats Q2 Estimates Raises Dividend and Completes ChampionX Acquisition
summary: Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) is one of the 13 Best Fortune 500 Dividend Stocks to Invest In. The company’s top executive makes a bold sales following mixed second-quarter results and the acquisition of ChampionX. The company reported its Q2 2025 earnings results on July 18, 2025. Its EPS of $0.74 during the quarter beat the consensus […]
